item.title: The Magnetic Hill Illusion of Ladakh
item.description: High on the Leh–Kargil–Baltal road in Ladakh, at an altitude of about 14,000 feet, lies one of India’s most fascinating geographical puzzles — Magnetic Hill. Known for its mysterious “gravity-defying” behavior, this stretch of road has captivated travelers, scientists, and photographers alike.
